hero.description: I am a passionate web developer specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences. I transform ideas into innovative and functional web solutions, from corporate websites to custom management systems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a web developer with experience in creating modern and responsive web applications. My passion is building digital solutions that not only look good but also solve real problems for my clients.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in full-stack web development, creating both corporate websites and custom management systems. My approach focuses on creating intuitive and functional user experiences that help businesses achieve their goals.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: These are the technologies and skills I work with to create exceptional digital solutions.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Creation of modern and responsive interfaces with React, Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Building APIs and services with Node.js, Express and SQL/NoSQL databases.

management.title: Management Systems
management.description: Development of custom applications for business administration and inventory.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Implementation of online stores with payment systems and product management.

webdesign.title: Web Design
webdesign.description: Creation of intuitive interfaces and attractive user experiences.

versioncontrol.title: Version Control
versioncontrol.description: Code management with Git, GitHub and team work methodologies.

programming.title: Programming Languages
programming.description: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, PHP and more.

deployment.title: Deployment & Hosting
deployment.description: Implementation and deployment of applications on servers and cloud services.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here is a selection of projects I have worked on. Each one represents different skills and solutions for different clients.

projectDescriptions.eire: Educational website for the Eastern Region Integral School, with informative sections and access to virtual classrooms.
projectDescriptions.hawkers: Online store for the Hawkers sunglasses brand, with product catalog and shopping system.
projectDescriptions.amv: Custom management system for AMV Store, with inventory, sales and customer management.
projectDescriptions.portfolio: Personal website showcasing my projects and skills as a web developer.
projectDescriptions.charruashop: Charrua Shop is an online store developed on Shopify, designed to offer a simple, modern, and fully responsive shopping experience.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind or need a custom digital solution? Fill out the form below or contact me directly.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Message sent successfully! I will get back to you soon.
contact.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

footer.description: Web developer specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences and innovative web solutions for companies and organizations.
